title: Natural Explorer
content:
. You gain Resistance toCold.

You have spent endless days surviving forbidden deserts. You gain Resistance toFire.

You have spent endless days surviving fetid swamps. You gain Resistance toPoison.

How to unlock Natural Explorer

Natural Explorer can be acquired by: Ranger (Lvl 1)

Natural Explorer Tips & Notes

For the Beast Tamer feature, you can only cast Find Familiar once per short rest. Cold, Fire, and Poison are the most common types of damage so having resistance to any of them without
